abdominal-distension.name: abdominal-distension
abdominal-distension.description: Bloating and swelling in the belly area.

abdominal-pain.name: abdominal-pain
abdominal-pain.description: Pain from inside the abdomen or the outer muscle wall, ranging from mild and temporary to severe and requiring emergency care.

abdominal-tenderness.name: abdominal-tenderness
abdominal-tenderness.description: Tenderness or pain of the abdomen.

angular-cheilitis.name: angular-cheilitis
angular-cheilitis.description: Inflammation and small cracks in one or both corners of the mouth.

blood-pressure.name: blood-pressure
blood-pressure.description: Pressure of circulating blood against the walls of blood vessels.

bow-legs.name: bow-legs
bow-legs.description: When the legs curve outward at the knees while the feet and ankles touch.

brudzinskis-sign.name: brudzinskis-sign
brudzinskis-sign.description: Severe neck stiffness causes a patient's hips and knees to flex when the neck is flexed.

capillary-refill.name: capillary-refill
capillary-refill.description: Time taken for a distal capillary bed to regain its color after pressure has been applied to cause blanching

chest-pain.name: chest-pain
chest-pain.description: Discomfort in the chest including a dull ache, a crushing or burning feeling, a sharp stabbing pain and pain that radiates to the neck or shoulder.

chest-tightness.name: chest-tightness
chest-tightness.description: Tightness or squeezing feeling in the chest.

clubbing.name: clubbing
clubbing.description: An abnormal, rounded shape of the nail bed.

constipation.name: constipation
constipation.description: When a person passes less than three bowel movements a week or has difficult bowel movements.

cough.name: cough
cough.description: A sudden, forceful hacking sound to release air and clear an irritation in the throat or airway.

crying.name: crying
crying.description: Tears or water coming from eyes.

cyanosis.name: cyanosis
cyanosis.description: Bluish or greyish colour of the skin, nails, lips or around the eyes.

dactylitis.name: dactylitis
dactylitis.description: Swelling of a finger or a toe.

dehydration.name: dehydration
dehydration.description: Loss of body fluid caused by illness, sweating or inadequate intake.

diarrhoea.name: diarrhoea
diarrhoea.description: Loose, watery stools that occur more frequently than usual.

dry-mucosa.name: dry-mucosa
dry-mucosa.description: Dryness around the nose, eyes, and/ or mouth.

dysphagia.name: dysphagia
dysphagia.description: Difficulty swallowing foods or liquids, arising from the throat or oesophagus, ranging from mild difficulty to complete and painful blockage.

dysuria.name: dysuria
dysuria.description: Discomfort, pain or burning when urinating.

ear-pressure.name: ear-pressure
ear-pressure.description: A feeling of fullness or pressure in the ear.

ecchymosis.name: ecchymosis
ecchymosis.description: A discoloration of the skin resulting from bleeding underneath that can be black, blue, or yellow in color.

edema.name: edema
edema.description: Swelling caused by excess fluid trapped in the body's tissues.

enlarged-tonsils.name: enlarged-tonsils
enlarged-tonsils.description: Swollen tonsils in the back of the throat.

enlarged-tympanic-membrane.name: enlarged-tympanic-membrane
enlarged-tympanic-membrane.description: Swollen or inflammed tympanic membrane due to infection.

enurisis.name: enurisis
enurisis.description: Night time loss of bladder control, or bed-wetting, usually in children.

epitastaxis.name: epitastaxis
epitastaxis.description: A nosebleed or minor bleeding from the blood vessels of the nose.

excessive-sweating.name: excessive-sweating
excessive-sweating.description: Abnormally excessive sweating that's not necessarily related to heat or exercise

facial-pressure.name: facial-pressure
facial-pressure.description: Feeling of fullness in the face.

fever.name: fever
fever.description: A temporary increase in average body temperature of 37Â°C.

foamy-urine.name: foamy-urine
foamy-urine.description: Urime with small to medium sized bubbles.

growth-failure.name: growth-failure
growth-failure.description: A growth rate below the appropriate growth velocity for age.

hair-changes.name: hair-changes
hair-changes.description: Abnormal changes to the color or texture of hair.

hair-loss.name: hair-loss
hair-loss.description: Hair falling out from the scalp or other parts of the body.

headache.name: headache
headache.description: A painful sensation in any part of the head, ranging from sharp to dull, that may occur with other symptoms.

hearing-loss.name: hearing-loss
hearing-loss.description: Total or significant loss of hearing.

heart-murmur.name: heart-murmur
heart-murmur.description: An extra sound in the heartbeat -- such as a ''whooshing'' -- that is caused by turbulent blood flow through the heart valves.

hemarthrosis.name: hemarthrosis
hemarthrosis.description: Articular bleeding into the joint cavity.

hematoma.name: hematoma
hematoma.description: Collection of blood outside of blood vessel, commonly caused by trauma.

hyperemic-pharynx.name: hyperemic-pharynx
hyperemic-pharynx.description: Red and swollen pharynx at the back of the throat.

hyperemic-tonsils.name: hyperemic-tonsils
hyperemic-tonsils.description: Red and irritated tonsils in the back of the throat.

hyperemic-tympanic-membrane.name: hyperemic-tympanic-membrane
hyperemic-tympanic-membrane.description: Red appearance on the tympanic membrane due to increased blood flow.

hyperpigmentation.name: hyperpigmentation
hyperpigmentation.description: Darkened patches or spots on the skin.

hypopigmentation.name: hypopigmentation
hypopigmentation.description: Lightened patches or spots on the skin.

hypothermia.name: hypothermia
hypothermia.description: A significant and potentially dangerous drop in body temperature.

indrawing.name: indrawing
indrawing.description: Inward movement of the lower chest wall when a child breathes in.

intercostal-recession.name: intercostal-recession
intercostal-recession.description: Sharp inward pull of the intercostal muscles due to reduced pressure in the chest.

jaundice.name: jaundice
jaundice.description: Yellow skin caused by the build-up of bilirubin in the blood.

joint-pain.name: joint-pain
joint-pain.description: Physical discomfort where two or more bones meet to form a joint, ranging from mild to disabling.

joint-swelling.name: joint-swelling
joint-swelling.description: Swelling or enlarging of joints due to increased fluid in the tissue surrounding joints.

kernigs-sign.name: kernigs-sign
kernigs-sign.description: Severe stiffness of the hamstrings causes an inability to straighten the leg when the hip is flexed to 90 degrees.

limited-range-of-motion.name: limited-range-of-motion
limited-range-of-motion.description: A joint with a reduction in its ability to move or bend.

malnutrition.name: malnutrition
malnutrition.description: Deficiencies, excesses or imbalances in a person's intake of energy and/or nutrients.

mental-status.name: mental-status
mental-status.description: Mental capacity, including level of consciousness, attentiveness, motor and speech activity, mood, and affect.

mid-upper-arm-circumference.name: mid-upper-arm-circumference
mid-upper-arm-circumference.description: A measure to assess nutritional status by looking at the circumference of the left upper arm.

muscle-tone.name: muscle-tone
muscle-tone.description: Amount of tension (or resistance to movement) in muscles.

nasal-congestion.name: nasal-congestion
nasal-congestion.description: A stuffy nose, when nasal tissues are swollen with fluid.

nasal-polyps.name: nasal-polyps
nasal-polyps.description: A painless benign growth on the lining of the nose or sinuses.

night-sweats.name: night-sweats
night-sweats.description: Repeated episodes of extreme perspiration that may soak your nightclothes or bedding.

oliguria.name: oliguria
oliguria.description: Urine output below normal or low.

orthopnea.name: orthopnea
orthopnea.description: Discomfort when breathing while lying down flat.

otalgia.name: otalgia
otalgia.description: Ear pain in the inner or outer ear that may interfere with ability to hear.

otorrhea.name: otorrhea
otorrhea.description: Fluid or discharge from the ear.

pallor.name: pallor
pallor.description: Paleness or loss of colour from the skin or mucous membranes.

peritonsillar-abscess.name: peritonsillar-abscess
peritonsillar-abscess.description: Collection of pus in the tissues of the throat.

petechiae.name: petechiae
petechiae.description: Tiny round, brown-purple spots due to bleeding under the skin or mucous membranes.

photosensitivity.name: photosensitivity
photosensitivity.description: Itchy eruptions or areas of redness and inflammation on sun-exposed skin.

polyuria.name: polyuria
polyuria.description: The need to urinate more often than normal.

poor-feeding.name: poor-feeding
poor-feeding.description: Little interest in feeding or easily fatigued when feeding.

pruritis.name: pruritis
pruritis.description: Also called itchy skin, it is an uncomfortable, irritating sensation that makes someone want to scratch.

pulling-on-ear.name: pulling-on-ear
pulling-on-ear.description: Touching or pulling on ear, especially for infants.

pulse-rate.name: pulse-rate
pulse-rate.description: The number of times your heart beats in one minute.

purpura.name: purpura
purpura.description: A rash of purple spots, also called blood spots.

rhinorrhea.name: rhinorrhea
rhinorrhea.description: Excess drainage, ranging from a clear fluid to thick mucus, from the nose and nasal passages.

seizures.name: seizures
seizures.description: Sudden, uncontrolled electrical disturbance in the brain that causes changes in behavior, movements or feelings, and in levels of consciousness.

sinus-tenderness.name: sinus-tenderness
sinus-tenderness.description: Tenderness or pain of the facial sinuses.

skin-desquamation.name: skin-desquamation
skin-desquamation.description: An unintended damage to and loss of the upper layer of skin.

skin-lesions.name: skin-lesions
skin-lesions.description: An abnormal lump, bump, ulcer, sore, or colored area of the skin.

skin-rash.name: skin-rash
skin-rash.description: Temporary outbreak of red, bumpy, scaly or itchy patches of skin, possibly with blisters or welts.

sneezing.name: sneezing
sneezing.description: A powerful, involuntary expulsion of air.

snoring.name: snoring
snoring.description: Hoarse or harsh sound from the nose or mouth that happens when breathing is partially obstructed while sleeping.

sore-throat.name: sore-throat
sore-throat.description: Pain or irritation in the throat that can occur with or without swallowing

stridor.name: stridor
stridor.description: An abnormal, high-pitched, musical breathing sound.

stunting.name: stunting
stunting.description: Impaired growth and development, typically seen in children.

sunken-eyes.name: sunken-eyes
sunken-eyes.description: Skin under the eyes appearing dark, sunken, and hollow.

syncope.name: syncope
syncope.description: Fainting or a sudden temporary loss of consciousness.

tachycardia.name: tachycardia
tachycardia.description: Fast beating heart or fast heart rate.

teeth-malocclusion.name: teeth-malocclusion
teeth-malocclusion.description: Misaligned teeh or the abnormal alignment of the upper and lower teeth.

tet-spell.name: tet-spell
tet-spell.description: Deep blue skin, nails, and lips in an infant after crying or feeding caused by a rapid drop in the amount of oxygen in the blood.

underweight.name: underweight
underweight.description: A weight considered too low for good health.

vomiting.name: vomiting
vomiting.description: Forcefully expelling the stomach's contents out of the mouth.

weight-faltering.name: weight-faltering
weight-faltering.description: Weight gain is slow or delayed, especially for infants and children.

weight-gain.name: weight-gain
weight-gain.description: Kilograms added to body mass, often resulting from overeating or lack of physical activity.

wheezing.name: wheezing
wheezing.description: A high-pitched whistling sound made while breathing.

abdominal-distension.name: Kuvimba kwa tumbo
abdominal-distension.description: Kuvimba na kuwa na uvimbe kwenye eneo la tumbo.

abdominal-pain.name: Maumivu ya tumbo
abdominal-pain.description: Maumivu kutoka ndani ya tumbo au ukuta wa nje wa misuli, kuanzia ya upole na ya muda hadi makali na yanayohitaji huduma ya dharura.

abdominal-tenderness.name: abdominal-tenderness
abdominal-tenderness.description: Tenderness or pain of the abdomen.

angular-cheilitis.name: Angular Cheilitis
angular-cheilitis.description: Kuvimba na mipasuko midogo katika kona moja au zote mbili za mdomo.

blood-pressure.name: Shinikizo la damu
blood-pressure.description: Shinikizo la mzunguko wa damu dhidi ya kuta za mishipa ya damu.

bow-legs.name: Bow Legs
bow-legs.description: Miguu inapopinda kwa nje kwenye magoti huku viganja na vifundo vya miguu vinagusana.

brudzinskis-sign.name: Brudzinskis Sign
brudzinskis-sign.description: Kukakamaa sana kwa shingo husababisha nyonga na magoti ya mgonjwa kujikunja wakati shingo inapokunjamana.

capillary-refill.name: Kujazwa tena kwa Capillary
capillary-refill.description: Muda uliochukuliwa kwa kapilari kurejesha rangi yake baada ya shinikzo kutumika kusababisha rangi nyeupe

chest-pain.name: Maumivu ya kifua
chest-pain.description: Usumbufu katika kifua ikiwa ni pamoja na kuuma kidogo, hisia ya kupondwa au kuungua, maumivu makali ya kisu na maumivu ambayo hutoka kwenye shingo au bega.

chest-tightness.name: Kubanwa Kifua
chest-tightness.description: Kubanwa au hisia ya mgandamizo kwenye kifua

clubbing.name: Clubbing
clubbing.description: Umbo lisilo la kawaida, la mviringo wa ukucha.

constipation.name: Kukosa choo
constipation.description: Wakati mtu anapopata choo chini ya mara tatu kwa wiki au kupata choo kigumu.

cough.name: Kikohozi
cough.description: Sauti ya ghafla na yenye nguvu ya kutoa hewa na kuondoa mwasho kwenye koo au njia ya hewa.

cyanosis.name: Cyanosis
cyanosis.description: Rangi ya blue au kijivu ya ngozi, kucha, midomo au karibu na macho.

dactylitis.name: dactylitis
dactylitis.description: Kuvimba kwa kidole au kidole cha mguu

dehydration.name: upungufu wa maji mwilini
dehydration.description: Kupoteza maji mwilini kunakosababishwa na ugonjwa, jasho au ulaji usiofaa.

diarrhoea.name: Kuhara
diarrhoea.description: Vinyesi vya majimaji ambavyo hutokea mara kwa mara kuliko kawaida.

dry-mucosa.name: Dry Mucosa
dry-mucosa.description: Ukavu kuzunguka pua, macho, na/au mdomo.

dysphagia.name: Dysphagia
dysphagia.description: Maumivu na ugumu wa kumeza vyakula au vimiminika, unaotokana na koo la chakula kuziba.

dysphonia.name: Dysphonia
dysphonia.description: Uchakacho wa sauti au sauti isiyo ya kawaida.

dysuria.name: Dysuria
dysuria.description: Usumbufu, maumivu au hisia ya kuungua wakati wa kukojoa.

ear-pressure.name: Shinikizo la Masikio
ear-pressure.description: Hisia ya ujazo au shinikizo katika sikio.

ecchymosis.name: Ecchymosis
ecchymosis.description: Kubadilika kwa rangi ya ngozi kutokana na kutokwa na damu ambayo inaweza kuwa ya rangi nyeusi, bluu au manjano.

edema.name: Edema
edema.description: Uvimbe unaosababishwa na maji ya zaida yaliyonaswa kwenye tishu za mwili.

enlarged-tonsils.name: Tezi kubwa
enlarged-tonsils.description: Kuvimba kwa tezi nyuma ya koo.

enlarged-tympanic-membrane.name: Enlarged Tympanic Membrane
enlarged-tympanic-membrane.description: kuvimba kwa ngozi ya ndani ya sikio kwa sabau ya maambukizi

enurisis.name: Enurisis
enurisis.description: Kupoteza udhibiti wa kibofu wakati wa usiku, au Kukojoa kitandani, hususani kawaida kwa watoto.

epitastaxis.name: Epitastaxis
epitastaxis.description: Kutokwa na puani au damu kidogo kutoka kwenye mishipa ya damu ya pua.

excessive-sweating.name: Kutokwa na jasho kupindukia
excessive-sweating.description: Kutokwa na jasho kupita kiasi na hakuhusiani na joto au mazoezi

fever.name: homa
fever.description: Onezeko la joto mwilini linalozidi nyuzijoto 37

foamy-urine.name: Mkojo wenye Povu
foamy-urine.description: mkojo wenye mapovu madogo madogo na ya saizi ya kati

frontal-bossing.name: Frontal Bossing
frontal-bossing.description: Paji la uso lisilo la kawaida

growth-failure.name: kudumaa
growth-failure.description: Kiwango cha ukuaji kilicho chini ya kasi inayofaa ya ukuaji kwa umri.

hair-changes.name: Mabadiliko ya Nywele
hair-changes.description: Mabadiliko yasiyo ya kawaida kwenye rangi au muundo wa nywele.

hair-loss.name: Kupoteza nywele
hair-loss.description: Nywele kuanguka kutoka kichwani au sehemu nyingine za mwili.

headache.name: maumivu ya kichwa
headache.description: Hisia za maumivu katika sehemu yoyote ya kichwa, yaweza kuwa mkali au yasiwe makali, ambayo inaweza kutokea kwa dalili nyingine.

heart-murmur.description: Sauti ya ziada katika mapigo ya moyo kama vile ''kutetemeka'' ambayo husababishwa na mtiririko wa damu unaosumbua kupitia vali za moyo.

hemarthrosis.name: Hemarthrosis
hemarthrosis.description: Kutokwa na damu kwenye eneo la kiungio/ jointi

hematoma.name: Hematoma
hematoma.description: Mkusanyiko wa damu nje ya mshipa wa damu, unaosababishwa na majeraha.

hyperemic-pharynx.name: Hyperemic Pharynx
hyperemic-pharynx.description: koromeo lililovimba na kuwa jekundu kwa upande wa nyuma

hyperemic-tonsils.name: Hyperemic Tonsils
hyperemic-tonsils.description: Tonsils nyekundu na yenye kuwasha nyuma ya koo.

hyperemic-tympanic-membrane.name: Hyperemic Tympanic Membrane
hyperemic-tympanic-membrane.description: Mwonekano mwekundu kwenye ngozi ya ngoma ya sikio kutokana na kuongezeka kwa damu.

hyperpigmentation.name: Kuongezeka kwa rangi
hyperpigmentation.description: Madoa meusi au madoa kwenye ngozi.

hypopigmentation.name: Hypopigmentation
hypopigmentation.description: Madoa meupe au mabaka kwenye ngozi.

hypothermia.name: Hypothermia
hypothermia.description: Kushuka kwa kiasi kubwa na hatari kwa joto la mwili.

indrawing.name: kuvuta ndani
indrawing.description: kuingia ndani kwa sehemu ya chini ya ukuta wa kifua cha  mtoto anapopumua.

intercostal-recession.description: Kuvuta kwa ndani kwa kasi kwa misuli ya kifua kutokana na kupunguzwa kwa shinikizo ndani kifua.

jaundice.name: Ugonjwa wa manjano
jaundice.description: Ngozi ya manjano inayosababishwa na kuongezeka kwa bilirubini kwenye damu.

joint-pain.name: maumivu ya viungo
joint-pain.description: Usumbufu pale ambapo mifupa miwili au zaidi hukutana na kuunda kiungo, waweza kusababisha ulemavu.

joint-swelling.description: Kuvimba au kuongezeka kwa viungo kwa sababu ya kuongezeka kwa maji kujikusanya kwenye tishu zinazozunguka viungo.

kernigs-sign.description: Ugumu mkubwa wa misuli ya paja ambayo husababisha kutoweza kunyoosha mguu wakati nyonga inazunguka hadi digrii 90.

limited-range-of-motion.description: jointi yenye uwezo mdogo wa kusongea au kuinama.

malnutrition.description: Mapungufu, ziada au kutokuwa na usawa katika ulaji wa virutubisho.

mental-status.name: Hali ya Akili
mental-status.description: Uwezo wa kiakili, ikiwa ni pamoja na kiwango cha fahamu, usikivu na kauli, hisia na athari.

mid-upper-arm-circumference.description: Kipimo cha kutathmini hali ya lishe kwa kuangalia mzingo wa mkono wa juu wa kushoto.

muscle-tone.name: Muscle Tone
muscle-tone.description: Kiasi cha mvutano (au upinzani wa misuli kusogea) kwenye misuli.

nasal-congestion.name: Msongamano puani
nasal-congestion.description: Pua iliyovimba, wakati tishu za pua zimevimba kwa sababu ya  majimaji.

nasal-polyps.description: Ukuaji usio na maumivu kwenye utando wa pua

night-sweats.description: Vipindi vinavyojirudia vya jasho kali ambalo linaweza kulowanisha nguo zako za kulalia au mashuka

oliguria.name: Oliguria
oliguria.description: kupata mkojo chini ya kiwango cha kawaida

orthopnea.name: Orthopnea
orthopnea.description: Usumbufu wakati wa kupumua ukiwa umelala chini.

otalgia.name: Otalgia
otalgia.description: Maumivu ya sikio katika sikio la ndani au la nje ambayo inaweza kuiathiri uwezo wa kusikia.

pallor.name: Pallor
pallor.description: weupe au kupoteza rangi kwenye kwa ngozi

peritonsillar-abscess.name: Peritonsillar Abscess
peritonsillar-abscess.description: Mkusanyiko wa usaha katika tishu za koo.

petechiae.name: Petechiae
petechiae.description: Madoa madogo ya mviringo yenye rangi ya hudhurungi kutokana na kutokwa na damu chini ya ngozi .

photosensitivity.description: Milipuko ya kuwashwa au maeneo yenye uwekundu na kuvimba kwa Ngozi iliyo wazi. kwenye jua

polyuria.name: Polyuria
polyuria.description: Haja ya kukojoa mara nyingi zaidi kuliko kawaida.

poor-feeding.name: ulaji duni
poor-feeding.description: Nia kidogo katika kula au urahisi wa kupata uchovu wakati wa kula

pruritis.name: Pruritis
pruritis.description: Pia inaitwa ngozi inayowasha, ni hisia zisizofurahisha, zenye kuchochea na humfanya mtu kutaka kujikuna.

pulling-on-ear.name: Kuvuta Sikio
pulling-on-ear.description: Kugusa au kuvuta sikio, hasa kwa watoto wachanga.

pulse-rate.name: kiwango cha mapigo ya moyo
pulse-rate.description: Idadi ya mara mapigo ya moyo wako katika dakika moja.

purpura.name: Purpura
purpura.description: Upele wa madoa ya zambarau, pia huitwa madoa ya damu.

rhinorrhea.name: Rhinorrhea
rhinorrhea.description: kukauka kwa maji na kamasi nene, kutoka kwenye pua na njia za pua.

seizures.name: Mishtuko ya moyo
seizures.description: usumbufu wa ghafla wa umeme usiodhibitiwa katika ubongo unaosababisha mabadiliko katika tabia, miondoko au hisia, na katika viwango vya fahamu.

skin-desquamation.name: Uharibifu wa ngozi
skin-desquamation.description: Uharibifu usiotarajiwa na upotezaji wa tabaka la juu la ngozi.

skin-lesions.name: Vidonda vya ngozi
skin-lesions.description: Uvimbe usio wa kawaida, uvimbe, kidonda, kidonda au eneo la ngozi lenye rangi

skin-rash.name: Upele wa ngozi
skin-rash.description: Mlipuko wa muda wa mabaka mekundu, matuta, magamba au kuwasha kwenye ngozi, ikiwezekana na malengelenge au makovu

sneezing.name: Kupiga chafya
sneezing.description: Utoaji hewa kwa nguvu, bila hiari.

snoring.name: Kukoroma
snoring.description: Sauti kali kutoka puani au mdomoni ambayo hutokea wakati kupumua kunazuiliwa wakati wa kulala.

sore-throat.name: Koo Kuuma
sore-throat.description: Maumivu au kuwashwa kwenye koo ambayo inaweza kutokea au isitokee wakati wa kumeza

stridor.name: Stridor
stridor.description: Sauti isiyo ya kawaida, ya juu, ya kupumua

stunting.name: Kudumaa
stunting.description: Ukuaji na maendeleo duni, kawaida huonekana kwa watoto.

sunken-eyes.name: Macho Yanayozama
sunken-eyes.description: Ngozi chini ya macho inaonekana nyeusi, imezama ndani na tupu.

syncope.name: Syncope
syncope.description: Kuzirai au kupoteza fahamu kwa muda.

tachycardia.name: Tachycardia
tachycardia.description: Mapigo ya moyo yanayodunda haraka au mapigo ya moyo ya haraka.

tachypnoea.name: Tachypnoea
tachypnoea.description: Kupumua kwa kasi isiyo ya kawaida.

teeth-malocclusion.name: mpangilio usio kamili wa meno
teeth-malocclusion.description: Meno yasiyopangwa vizuri au mpangilio usio wa kawaida wa meno ya juu na ya chini.

tet-spell.name: Tet Spell
tet-spell.description: Ngozi, kucha na midomo ya bluu kwa mtoto mchanga baada ya kulia au kulishwa chakula hii inasababishwa na kushuka kwa kasi kwa kiasi cha oksijeni katika damu.

underweight.name: uzito mdogo
underweight.description: Uzito unaochukuliwa kuwa mdogo sana kwa afya njema.

vomiting.name: kutapika
vomiting.description: Kutoa nje kwa nguvu yaliyomo tumboni kupitia kinywa.

wasting.name: Wasting
wasting.description: Uzito wa chini kwa uwiano wa urefu.

weight-faltering.name: Uzito Kupungua
weight-faltering.description: Kuongezeka kwa uzito ni polepole au kuchelewa, hasa kwa watoto wachanga na watoto.

weight-gain.name: kuongezeka uzito
weight-gain.description: Kilo zilizoongezwa  mara nyingi hutokana na kula kupita kiasi au ukosefu wa mazoezi ya mwili.

wheezing.name: Kupumua
wheezing.description: Sauti ya juu ya mluzi inayosikika wakati wa kupumua.
